title: HNB partners M.D. Gunasena to donate books to rural schools
body_lines: Sri Lanka’s leading private bank HNB PLC recently joined hands with one of the country’s leading premium bookstores- M.D. Gunasena, to support the “donate a book for change” CSR campaign to donate books and valuable reading material to schools in rural areas.

The two companies inked their partnership at the HNB Head Office in the presence of HNB Deputy General Manager- Retail & SME Banking, Sanjay Wijemanne, HNB Head of Network Management & Business Development, Supun Dias, HNB Senior Manager Head Office Customer Centre, Dilanka De Silva together with M.D Gunasena Managing Director, Rajiv Gunasena, M. D Gunasena Director, Hasitha Nanayakkara and M. D Gunasena Director, Yevinda Amarasekara.

“M.D. Gunasena has been conducting its “Donate a book for change” programme for over 2 years, with the aim of supporting school children from rural regions in the country. This great initiative will fuel the futures of students across the island and we are delighted to be a part of this life-changing opportunity,” HNB Deputy General Manager- Retail & SME Banking, Sanjay Wijemanne said.
